headerDisplay: Lennox S30/E30/M30 thermostat integration via cloud API. Use your myicomfort.com credentials.
footerDisplay: For multi-zone systems, each zone will appear as a separate thermostat in HomeKit.

name.title: Platform Name
name.description: The name that will appear in the Homebridge log.

pollInterval.title: Poll Interval (seconds)
pollInterval.description: How often to poll the Lennox cloud for updates (in seconds). Minimum 5 seconds.

appId.title: Application ID
appId.description: Custom application ID for API authentication. Leave blank to use the default.

debugmode.title: Debug Mode
debugmode.description: Enable debug logging and use test device IDs.

temperatureUnit.title: Temperature Display Unit
temperatureUnit.description: Temperature display preference. 'Auto' uses whatever your thermostat is set to.

enableEmergencyHeat.title: Enable Emergency Heat Switch
enableEmergencyHeat.description: For dual-fuel systems, adds a switch accessory to enable emergency heat only mode.
